#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,count,i,len;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        count = 0;
        char a[201];
        cin>>a;
        len=strlen(a);
        for(i=4;i<len-4;i++)
            if((a[i]=='a')||(a[i]=='e')||(a[i]=='i')||(a[i]=='o')||(a[i]=='u')||(a[i]=='A')||(a[i]=='E')||(a[i]=='I')||(a[i]=='O')||(a[i]=='U'))
            count++;
        i=len-4-count;
        cout<<i<<"/"<<len<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
